law.text: Instead of the procedures under this subtitle, a municipal corporation, by charter amendment adopted under Article 23A of the Code, or a charter county, by charter amendment adopted under Article XI-A of the Maryland Constitution, may provide for the issuance of revenue bonds under the terms and conditions that the municipal corporation or charter county considers appropriate to achieve the legislative purposes of this subtitle.
